pokemon.name: chespin
pokemon.dex: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

pokemon.name: quilladin
pokemon.dex: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.

pokemon.name: chesnaught
pokemon.dex: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

pokemon.name: fennekin
pokemon.dex: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: braixen
pokemon.dex: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

pokemon.name: delphox
pokemon.dex: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

pokemon.name: froakie
pokemon.dex: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

pokemon.name: frogadier
pokemon.dex: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.

pokemon.name: greninja
pokemon.dex: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

pokemon.name: bunnelby
pokemon.dex: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

pokemon.name: diggersby
pokemon.dex: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

pokemon.name: fletching
pokemon.dex: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

pokemon.name: fletchinder
pokemon.dex: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

pokemon.name: talonflame
pokemon.dex: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

pokemon.name: scatterbug
pokemon.dex: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

pokemon.name: spewpa
pokemon.dex: The beaks of bird Pokémon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

pokemon.name: vivillon
pokemon.dex: The patterns on this Pokémon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

pokemon.name: litleo
pokemon.dex: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

pokemon.name: pyroar
pokemon.dex: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

pokemon.name: flabebe
pokemon.dex: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.

pokemon.name: floette
pokemon.dex: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

pokemon.name: florges
pokemon.dex: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

pokemon.name: skiddo
pokemon.dex: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

pokemon.name: gogoat
pokemon.dex: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

pokemon.name: pancham
pokemon.dex: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.

pokemon.name: pangoro
pokemon.dex: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

pokemon.name: furfrou
pokemon.dex: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

pokemon.name: espurr
pokemon.dex: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

pokemon.name: meowstic
pokemon.dex: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

pokemon.name: honedge
pokemon.dex: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

pokemon.name: doublade
pokemon.dex: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

pokemon.name: aegislash
pokemon.dex: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

pokemon.name: spritzee
pokemon.dex: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

pokemon.name: aromatisse
pokemon.dex: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

pokemon.name: swirlix
pokemon.dex: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

pokemon.name: slurpuff
pokemon.dex: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

pokemon.name: inkay
pokemon.dex: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

pokemon.name: malamar
pokemon.dex: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

pokemon.name: binacle
pokemon.dex: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

pokemon.name: barbaracle
pokemon.dex: __________'s legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

pokemon.name: skrelp
pokemon.dex: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

pokemon.name: dragalge
pokemon.dex: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

pokemon.name: clauncher
pokemon.dex: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

pokemon.name: clawitzer
pokemon.dex: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

pokemon.name: helioptile
pokemon.dex: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

pokemon.name: heliolisk
pokemon.dex: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

pokemon.name: tyrunt
pokemon.dex: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

pokemon.name: tyrantrum
pokemon.dex: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

pokemon.name: amaura
pokemon.dex: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

pokemon.name: aurorus
pokemon.dex: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.

pokemon.name: sylveon
pokemon.dex: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.

pokemon.name: hawlucha
pokemon.dex: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

pokemon.name: dedenne
pokemon.dex: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

pokemon.name: carbink
pokemon.dex: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

pokemon.name: goomy
pokemon.dex: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

pokemon.name: sliggoo
pokemon.dex: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.

pokemon.name: goodra
pokemon.dex: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.

pokemon.name: klefki
pokemon.dex: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

pokemon.name: phantump
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

pokemon.name: trevenant
pokemon.dex: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

pokemon.name: pumpkaboo
pokemon.dex: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

pokemon.name: gourgeist
pokemon.dex: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

pokemon.name: bergmite
pokemon.dex: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.

pokemon.name: avalugg
pokemon.dex: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

pokemon.name: noibat
pokemon.dex: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

pokemon.name: noivern
pokemon.dex: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.

pokemon.name: xerneas
pokemon.dex: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

pokemon.name: yveltal
pokemon.dex: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

pokemon.name: zygarde
pokemon.dex: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.

pokemon.name: diancie
pokemon.dex: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

pokemon.name: hoopa
pokemon.dex: It gathers things it likes and passes them through its loop to teleport them to a secret place.

pokemon.name: volcanion
pokemon.dex: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
